## Description {#details}

Data about a loop.

Contains the data necessary to represent a loop as a pseudo-node once it&#39;s packaged.

Definition at line 224 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.h</a>.
